text: Mother (マザー Mazā) is a 1989 video game sold only in Japan for the Family Computer (FC). They planned to sell the game in the USA, but Nintendo of America chose not to release it. This is because when they finished making it into English, the Super Nintendo Entertainment System was already being sold. The game was released on the Wii U Virtual Console in the US in 2015. == Character list == * Ninten (ニンテン Ninten) (Also known as "Ken" (ケン Ken) in the MOTHER novel) * Ana (アナ Ana) * Loid (ロイド Roido) * Teddy (テディ Tedi) * Queen Mary (クイーン・マリー Kuīn Marī) * Mama * Papa * Minnie * Mimmie * Giygas ==Other websites== * EarthBound IPM * Starmen.net: Earthbound Zero * Mother Party (Mother-jp.net): Mother (Japanese) Category:1989 video games Category:Mother (video game series) Category:Pax Softnica games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Nintendo Entertainment System games Category:Single-player video games Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Virtual Console games Category:Virtual Console games for Wii U
title: Mother (video game)
